edu.gordon.physical

Class NetworkToBankSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gordon.physical.NetworkToBankSimulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkToBankInterface

    public class NetworkToBankSimulation
extends Object
implements NetworkToBankInterface
    Manager for the ATM's network connection. In a real ATM, this would manage a physical device; in this edu.gordon.simulation, it uses classes in package edu.gordon.simulation to simulate the device.
